item.title: Hailee Steinfeld has now grossed over $2B at the global box office.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
“I’m thankful that I have been a part of something that kept people in cinemas. Now, whether or not those films were to the detriment of other films, I don’t know.”
(https://gq-magazine.co.uk/article/chris-hemsworth-interview-2023/amp…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Chris Hemsworth was close to starring in a romantic drama in the vein of ‘A Star Is Born,’ until he realized it would “require him to sing about 20 covers of some of the most iconic songs of all time.”
“That scares the hell out of me to the point of submission.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Chris Hemsworth on Martin Scorsese and Quentin Tarantino’s criticism of Marvel: “That’s super depressing when I hear that. There goes two of my heroes I won’t work with. I guess they’re not a fan of me.”
He clarifies they are “still my heroes and I would leap to work with them.”
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Chris Hemsworth plays a bearded biker warlord named Dementus in George Miller’s upcoming ‘FURIOSA’ starring Anya Taylor-Joy.
(https://gq-magazine.co.uk/article/chris-hemsworth-interview-2023/amp…)
item.author: FilmUpdates
